data.title: Used Raymond EAS1R40TT Reach Trucks - 267" Lift Height
data.meta-title: Used Raymond EAS1R40TT Reach Trucks - 267" Lift Height
data.meta-description: Used Raymond EAS1R40TT Reach Trucks - 267" Lift Height For Sale at American Surplus, 4,000 lb. capacity, In Stock, Cleaned & Painted, 40-60% off retail prices on Used Raymond EAS1R40TT Reach Trucks

attribute.name: Battery
attribute.value: 36V (Battery Sold Separately, Battery Charger Included with Reach Truck)

long-description.p: Used Raymond EAS1R40TT Reach Trucks are in stock at ASI. We have these reach trucks with a 267" lift height and a 4,000 lb. capacity. They were built 2006-2008 and run using a 36V battery. The batteries are sold separately however we include battery charger with the price of the reach truck. For better handling and manueverability, our trucks have a sideshifter. Our reach trucks are cleaned, painted, and come with our 30-day guarantee. Call today for a quote on our Used Raymond EAS1R40TT Reach Trucks.

p.strong: We can’t list our entire inventory online, if you do not see what you are looking for, just ask! Quantity discounts available on used reach trucks 40-60% off the price of new. Call 800-876-3736 for additional information & a free quote. American Surplus will provide a quote on new equipment if used is unavailable. Nationwide shipping is available. Price and product availability subject to change without notice. Inventory is subject to prior sale.
